mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD_NOTICE ( IDX , USER_KEY , TITLE , NAME , CONTENTS , HIT_CNT , CHK_INFO , LUPD_CNT , DEL_YN , PC_DT , PC_TS ) VALUES ( NULL , #{USER_KEY} , #{TITLE} , #{NAME} , #{CONTENTS} , 1 , IFNULL(#{CHK_INFO}, '0') , 1 , 'N' , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET HIT_CNT = IFNULL(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND BOARD_KEY = #{BOARD_KEY}
mapper.select: SELECT (CASE WHEN T1.USER_KEY <> '' THEN ( SELECT T2.USER_NAME FROM TB_MEMBER T2 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.USER_KEY = T2.USER_KEY ) ELSE T1.NAME END) AS NAME , T1.BOARD_KEY , T1.USER_KEY , T1.BOARD_PWD , T1.CHK_INFO , T1.TITLE , T1.CONTENTS , DATE_FORMAT(T1.PC_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PC_DT FROM TB_BOARD T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BOARD_KEY = #{BOARD_KEY}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET LUPD_CNT = IFNULL(LUPD_CNT, 0) + 1 , DEL_YN = 'Y' , PC_TS = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE 1 = 1 AND BOARD_KEY = #{BOARD_KEY} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
